mapper.select: SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(CLASS PK_CLASS)*/ ROWNUM RN, CLASS.* FROM CLASS WHERE ROWNUM<=5
SELECT C.clsNo,C.clsName,C.mbId FROM CLASS C JOIN STUDENT S ON C.clsNo=S.clsNo WHERE S.MBID=#{mbId}
SELECT CLASS.*, CATE1.CATE1NAME, CATE2.CATE2NAME FROM CLASS LEFT JOIN CATE1 ON CLASS.CATE1NO = CATE1.CATE1NO LEFT JOIN CATE2 ON CLASS.CATE2NO = CATE2.CATE2NO WHERE CLSNO=#{clsNo} AND ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT (regiNo, clsNo, mbId, regiStartDate) VALUES (STUDENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clsNo}, #{mbId}, DEFALUT)
